code: "use client";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import Post from"../components/Post";import styles from"../styles/Post.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SinglePost=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[post,setPost]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchPost=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const res=await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/posts/${id}`);setPost(res.data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error("Error al cargar la publicación:",error);setError("No se pudo cargar la publicación. Puede que haya sido eliminada o no tengas permiso para verla.");setLoading(false);}};fetchPost();},[id]);const handleBack=()=>{navigate(-1);};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Cargando publicaci\xF3n..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"error-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"back-button",onClick:handleBack,children:"Volver"})]});}if(!post){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"error-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:"Publicaci\xF3n no encontrada"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"back-button",onClick:handleBack,children:"Volver"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles["single-post-container"],children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles["single-post-header"],children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"back-button",onClick:handleBack,children:"\u2190 Volver"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Publicaci\xF3n"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Post,{post:post})]});};export default SinglePost;
